entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 26. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 30 this evening and minus 40 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High minus 18.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the morning. High minus 18. Wind chill minus 38 in the morning and minus 24 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 24. POP 30%
entry.summary: Clear in the evening then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 25 in the evening and minus 35 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 28 January 2023
